short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your experience watching your favorite streams on Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing my Twitch extension designed to enhance the user experience while watching live streams. This feature-packed extension offers several functionalities, including screenshot capturing, vertical chat adaptation, video filter, auto bonus claiming, cinema mode, and the ability to block the signup banner when the user is not authenticated on the platform. Elevate your Twitch experience with this must-have extension!

- Screenshot Capture: Capture and preserve your favorite moments from Twitch streams with a single click!

- Vertical Chat: Optimize your screen real estate and making it easier than ever to engage with the community. Say goodbye to awkward scrolling and hello to a more intuitive chat experience.

- Video Filter: You can enhance their viewing experience by adjusting the visual aesthetic of the content being streamed.

- Auto Bonus Claim: Don't miss out on any rewards while watching your favorite streamers! Our extension automatically detects and claims bonuses, ensuring you never skip a beat.

- Cinema Mode: Immerse yourself in the ultimate viewing experience with Cinema Mode! Say goodbye to distractions and hello to a distraction-free streaming experience.

- Block Signup Banner: No more interruptions or pesky distractions! Our extension intelligently blocks the signup banner when you're not authenticated on Twitch.
